column5: I wasn't there, dammit.  JF
LOL
the other problem - lakair this and lakair that is completely hogging the board lol
LOL.. dont worry... it only lasts a couple of months...
Yeah then the posts asking about next years date start
The problem with LakAir is you have to leave eventually
Mebbe it's like staying a lifelong virgin. Ya just never know what you've been missing.  JF
Just like a luke warm apple Pie John ahahah LOL
As long as there's cheddar with it.  JF
....You should have been John, DANG you should have been.
I knew I shoulda gone when I saw the Grolsch that Sasquatch was drinking.  JF
You weren't at Lakair?  Huh....could have sworn you were.  Then again, it was all a blur.  See you again next year John.  Man I'm so confused.
Musta been a helluva time then, cuz I don't remember a thing. Was I driving?  JF
Definitely!  Been working away taking care of the camping gear, fishing gear and boat and the one thought that keeps entering my mind.........Wish I was prepping it all to go back.....
I think you're confusing "JohnF" with "John" -Brian
Whew! Thanks for clearing that up. I've been afraid to face my wife ever since I read that post.  JF
If ya aint ever been John, ya dont know what ya missing !  I missed it this year, and am I P*******ed !

The real problem with Lakair is it only happens once a year and is too short!!!   You not being there is your own fault John, try to remedy that next year eh?  I'll have a nice "Lakair Martini" waiting for you!!! (green stuff)... don't stand too close to the fire when you drink it though!
We missed you this year Jack, but are already lookin' forward to seein' ya next year!!!
Sounds like the stuff my buddy brings from Tennessee. He puts fresh strawberries in his, I think to give it a hint of colour so you can see the spills and don't accidentally drop a smoke in it.  JF
It's alright John! I'll bring "Lakair" back up in October.... when I get time to do a report on the whole affair !!
